name: Ode To Pele (hot & spicy spice/jerky blend)
description:
Blend of red pepper, chili pepper powder, garlic, coarse black peppercorns, onion, dry mustard. Jerky spice to add some great heat. Like your heat sweet? Add your favorite sweetner to this blend. Also really good on popcorn.
No salt, preservatives, msg, or anti caking agents added- just pure spice & flavor.
4oz tin with shrink band for safe travels & freshness. Idea card included.
